title: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman Invites US Varsities To Start Operation At IFSC - Outlook India
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman Invites US Varsities To Start Operation At IFSC  Outlook India
description: Budget 2022-23 permitted setting-up of world-class foreign universities in Gandhinagar's GIFT City, free from domestic regulations, to facilitate the availability of skilled manpower in the financial services space
